name: isomorphismes
body:
ISOMORPHISMES
=============




Popular
-------
* [Here's the problem with OK Cupid's matching algorithm.](http://isomorphismes.tumblr.com/post/13178732106/okcupid-whats-wrong-match-algorithm)
* [Change one thing and you change everything.](http://isomorphismes.tumblr.com/post/16039994007/thoroughly-enmeshed-composition-perturbation)
* [When Doves Cry Inside a Convex Hull](http://isomorphismes.tumblr.com/post/3235798592/when-doves-cry-and-the-ensuing-flight-of-fancy-via-linea)
* [Fahrenheit is better than Celsius.](http://isomorphismes.tumblr.com/post/3767526267/fahrenheit-versus-celsius)






Bare Bones Introductions to Computer Stuff
------------------------------------------
* [vi](http://stackoverflow.com/a/8949711/563329)
* perl (first steps in programming)






Play Around with R
------------------
* Simulate a fake economy
* Play with random walks
* 








For People Who Struggled with Mathematics in the Past
-----------------------------------------------------------------

* [What are sine and cosine?](http://isomorphismes.tumblr.com/post/1426364975/sin-cos)
* [Basic Dance Moves in Combinatorics](http://isomorphismes.tumblr.com/post/25436990586/combinatorics)
* I'm finally ready to learn calculus.
* I just want to read some mathematics, anything fun or stimulating, not necessarily a textbook or do things in school order.
* [What is the determinant of a matrix?](http://isomorphismes.tumblr.com/post/4810875961/determinant)




# Contact
